Blink.desc: Unlocks the ability to quickly teleport from one place to another.

Manaflow.desc: Increases the Mana Regeneration speed of the player.

Fluxbolt.desc: Casts a magic projectile that explodes on impact. Has potential to hit multiple times each rank.

Fluxspear.desc: Casts a piercing spear of arcane magic in front of the caster, dealing damage and stunning all adjacent targets.
